::FZ::

FZ begins to talk of events while he walks toward the training rooms.

"Lots of things have happened since you have been gone," he says, sorting
all the events in his mind, "You have probably noticed that this base is
very different from the one you last remember. The old one is under us
right now. You're on Alliance Island, where both bases are stationed. The
old one is buried underground, and provides the underwater shields while
this one provides the shields abovewater. During battle, the entire island
can be shielded, and if anyone tries to get here swimming, they'd have a
nice shock from the Iron Fist, which is the ship we're walking in. What
we're walking by now are the training rooms, by the way. This ship has the
latest Predacon technology, so those rooms are as advanced as
you'd need. Anyways, right now we are allied with the Destrons and the
Predacons. The Maximals are constantly being attacked by various factions,
and to keep the enemies coming at them, we help them survive. As long as
they remain a popular target, this base will be left alone and power can
be diverted from defence to other projects. Down that hallway is the brig,
not usually used. To your left are the residential quarters, and the next
left turn from there leads to most of the storage rooms. Up front is the
bridge."

FZ reaches the doors to the bridge and they slide apart. He walks in,
looking around. "This is the bridge. Top-of-the-line Predacon
technology. To the left are the cargo and docking bays, and to the right
are the labs. If we go through the door on the far side of the bridge and
follow the corridor to the end, we'd exit the base. Down that ladder is
the engine room, which is one of the few engine rooms on the planet that's
fully intact."

He pauses, looking at Wolfgang to see if the other had anything to say.
